ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp

Class Expense

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.team1travelexpenseapp.Expense

  • public class Expense
extends Object
    Implements the model of an Expense item which is an individual part of a specific claim and contains a date, category, description, cost, currency, receipt photo and whether the expense is flagged or incomplete.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Expense()
      Create a new Expense with its values uninitialized.
      Expense(String description, Date date, String category, BigDecimal amount, String currency)
      Create a new Expense with a given description, date, and category.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Expense

        public Expense(String description,
       Date date,
       String category,
       BigDecimal amount,
       String currency)
        Create a new Expense with a given description, date, and category. If all these values are set as something the Expense will be designated as complete by setting Expense.isComplete to true.
        Parameters:
        description - The Description for the Expense as a String.
        date - The date that the charge occurred on.
        category - The category type that the expense was used for (fuel, meal, supplies, ect...).
        amount - The number amount that the charge costed.
        currency - The type of currency the amount is in as a 3 letter string (CAD, USD< EUR, ect...).

      • Expense

        public Expense()
        Create a new Expense with its values uninitialized.
